p: The volatile compounds obtained from the aerial parts of different Astragalus species were analyzed both qualitatively and semi-quantitatively by GC-MS. All volatile component mixtures were yellow in color with a characteristic odor. GC analyses of the essential oils revealed the presence of 105 metabolites ( Table 1), which represented 73.28, 87.03, 74.38, 87.93, 85.83, and 91.39% of all Aca, Ach, Ale, Ama, Amu, and Asi volatile components, respectively.
